meta.title: Battery Rental Pricing | Humble Professional Power
meta.description: Transparent Humble battery systems rental pricing. All-inclusive rates with delivery, pickup, backup generator. Available through Humble.

hero.title: Rental Pricing and Options
hero.description: Transparent, all-inclusive rental pricing. Delivery, pickup, and backup generator included. No hidden fees, no fuel costs, no surprises. Promo code 241 for one free rental day.

items.title: Delivery and Pickup Included
items.description: White-glove service. We deliver, place, and pick up. You focus on production, not logistics.

items.title: Backup Generator Included
items.description: Every rental includes backup generator positioned away from sensitive areas. Peace of mind for extended shoots.

items.title: No Hidden Costs
items.description: No fuel charges, no fire watch fees, no permit costs. Transparent pricing includes everything you need.

items.title: One Transparent Rate
items.description: Contact Humble for current day rates and multi-day discounts. All-inclusive pricing covers delivery, placement, pickup, and backup generator.

items.title: Promo Code 241
items.description: ONE FREE RENTAL DAY with promo code "241" on your first booking. Experience professional battery power at no cost.

items.title: No Fuel, Fire Watch, or Permits
items.description: Battery operation eliminates fuel costs, fire watch requirements, and noise permit fees. What you see is what you pay.

items.title: Faster Setup and Wrap
items.description: 5-minute power-on. No fuel management. Instant shutdown. Shorter production days reduce crew costs and location fees.

items.title: Multi-Day Discounts
items.description: Extended rental rates available for week-long shoots, multi-day events, and festival installations. Contact Humble for custom quotes.

items.title: Package Deals Available
items.description: Rent multiple units for larger productions. Battery rotation support for 24-hour operations. Custom power solutions for complex needs.
